verses.text_plain: The king shall joy in thy strength, O Lord; and in thy salvation how greatly shall he rejoice!
verses.verse_html: 1The king shall joy in thy strength, O Lord; and in thy salvation how greatly shall he rejoice!

verses.text_plain: Thou hast given him his heart’s desire, and hast not withholden the request of his lips. Selah.
verses.verse_html: 2Thou hast given him his heart’s desire, and hast not withholden the request of his lips. Selah.

verses.text_plain: For thou preventest him with the blessings of goodness: thou settest a crown of pure gold on his head.
verses.verse_html: 3For thou preventest him with the blessings of goodness: thou settest a crown of pure gold on his head.

verses.text_plain: He asked life of thee, and thou gavest it him, even length of days for ever and ever.
verses.verse_html: 4He asked life of thee, and thou gavest it him, even length of days for ever and ever.

verses.text_plain: His glory is great in thy salvation: honour and majesty hast thou laid upon him.
verses.verse_html: 5His glory is great in thy salvation: honour and majesty hast thou laid upon him.

verses.text_plain: For thou hast made him most blessed for ever: thou hast made him exceeding glad with thy countenance.
verses.verse_html:
6For thou hast made him most blessed for ever: thou hast made him exceeding glad with thy countenance. ▼
▼ made him most…: Heb. set him to be blessings
 , ▼
▼ made him exceeding…: Heb. make him glad with joy

footnotes.body_text: ▼ made him most…: Heb. set him to be blessings
footnotes.body_html: ▼ made him most…: Heb. set him to be blessings

footnotes.body_text: ▼ made him exceeding…: Heb. make him glad with joy
footnotes.body_html: ▼ made him exceeding…: Heb. make him glad with joy

verses.text_plain: For the king trusteth in the Lord, and through the mercy of the most High he shall not be moved.
verses.verse_html: 7For the king trusteth in the Lord, and through the mercy of the most High he shall not be moved.

verses.text_plain: Thine hand shall find out all thine enemies: thy right hand shall find out those that hate thee.
verses.verse_html: 8Thine hand shall find out all thine enemies: thy right hand shall find out those that hate thee.

verses.text_plain: Thou shalt make them as a fiery oven in the time of thine anger: the Lord shall swallow them up in his wrath, and the fire shall devour them.
verses.verse_html: 9Thou shalt make them as a fiery oven in the time of thine anger: the Lord shall swallow them up in his wrath, and the fire shall devour them.

verses.text_plain: Their fruit shalt thou destroy from the earth, and their seed from among the children of men.
verses.verse_html: 10Their fruit shalt thou destroy from the earth, and their seed from among the children of men.

verses.text_plain: For they intended evil against thee: they imagined a mischievous device, which they are not able to perform.
verses.verse_html: 11For they intended evil against thee: they imagined a mischievous device, which they are not able to perform.

verses.text_plain: Therefore shalt thou make them turn their back, when thou shalt make ready thine arrows upon thy strings against the face of them.
verses.verse_html:
12Therefore shalt thou make them turn their back, when thou shalt make ready thine arrows upon thy strings against the face of them. ▼
▼ shalt thou…: or, thou shalt set them as a butt
 , ▼
▼ back: Heb. shoulder

footnotes.body_text: ▼ shalt thou…: or, thou shalt set them as a butt
footnotes.body_html: ▼ shalt thou…: or, thou shalt set them as a butt

verses.text_plain: Be thou exalted, Lord, in thine own strength: so will we sing and praise thy power.
verses.verse_html: 13Be thou exalted, Lord, in thine own strength: so will we sing and praise thy power.
